review: Too soon to tell, just hooked up this weekend. very excited about trying it. no more evenings without anything to watch.I was easy to hook up and I am not very electronical!cant wait to put things in my watchlist.Terrie
author: Terrie J. Thompson

review: I love it. Finally getting to see Breaking Bad
author: Karen Brozek

review: Love my Fire TV stick!! selection is unlimited both Prime & all other available TV & movies.  Easy to install, easy to use.  Received it as a present & very happy I did.  It added a whole new dimension to watching TV & movies.
author: Nadine Lohr "Nadine"

review: Provides access to quality movies, music and books.
author: Richard Schneider "Rich"

review: Someone told me how easy it would be to install Fire TV Stick, and then access streaming material.  Was I surprised!  They were right!
author: TAG

review: This thing is amazing!!I got a Google Chrome Cast when it first came out, and I must say the Fire TV Stick is SOOOO much better. I would say one of the best parts is the remote and the welcome screen. With Chrome Cast you have to open up the app you want to choose to cast, make sure it is casting, then choose what you want...with Amazon, everything is on a single screen for you to choose from. Great search capabilities, apps, movies. LOVE IT.
author: Nora
